html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1996-05151996-04-160,  IA&ND,  ,  , 
PrecisAcceptance of a DESIGNATION whereby the KAMLOOPS INDIAN BAND surrenders, for an unspecified term, any of its rights and interest in some 1,000 acres of land on Kamloops Indian Reserve No. 1 in BRITISH COLUMBIA, and amends two earlier designations by extending their duration to 99 years (the Industrial Park and Halston Road Designations), for the purpose of leasing them to various tourism, recreation, retail and industrial businesses.
Attachments
